creditline: Gift of Mrs. E. L. Carpenter
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: bowl, lotus-shaped, on low slightly domed base; niello decoration of blossoms in profile arranged vertically in small panels with shaped tops which form the rim of the bowl; the same all-over design is repeated on the under part of the bowl and on the base, which is joined to the bowl proper by means of a snipped flange; the silver is extremely thin
title: Bowl
